verbs.description: arrest of singer in rock band unnecessary [ARG0: guitarist] [V: claims] somebody just plumb forgot to tell the members of 38 special that it was against the law in oklahoma to take a drink onstage so said guitarist jeff carlisi in a telephone interview friday after the arrest this week of 38 special lead singer donnie van zant in tulsa van zant was arraigned thursday on a charge violating state law by drinking liquor onstage his trial is set for july 1 the singer was arrested moments after the band wrapped up a wednesday night concert in tulsa the group is scheduled to appear tonight at lloyd noble center in norman with van zant free on 1 000 bond norman oklahoma jack daniels lynyrd skynyrd norman tulsa tulsa oklahoma jacksonville florida oklahoma donnie jacksonville van zant ronnie van zant carlisi lloyd noble center
